feed.title: bewCloud Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.6.0
entry.content:
You can now upload directories via web.

What's Changed

  • Upload Directories via Web by @BrunoBernardino in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/58

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.5.6...v1.6.0

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.6.1
entry.content:
Code refactoring, fix creating new notes and photos. Also, don't extend sessions in the database since the cookie isn't updated.

What's Changed

  • Refactor data handlers + misc fixes by @BrunoBernardino in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/59

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.7.0
entry.content:
New (more robust) configuration system (bewcloud.config.ts). Still backwards-compatible with .env config vars (but will show a deprecation waring), and .env is still used for secrets.

What's Changed

  • Implement a more robust Config by @BrunoBernardino in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/60

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.6.1...v1.7.0

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.7.1
entry.content:
Fix for file upload via web in Chrome and Firefox.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.7.0...v1.7.1

entry.title: New release for bewCloud: v1.8.0
entry.content:
This includes optional MFA support (requires using the new configuration file released in v1.7.0) with TOTP and Passkeys.

What's Changed

  • Add Optional MFA Support by @0xGingi in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/61

New Contributors

  • @0xGingi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/pull/61

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bewcloud/bewcloud/compare/v1.7.1...v1.8.0
